posts.post_title: ***For Sale T206 Miller Huggins UPSIDE DOWN BACK ***
posts.post_content:
Posted By: DB
For sale is a T206 with a Sweet Corporal upside down back from 350 series. It is graded by SGC as fair 20 but the card is clearly nicer than that if only for the error reverse. The card is the Hands at Mouth variation of Huggins. Please email me at Kilaartist@aol.com for scans of the card and for offers. I great  true error card for your collection!!!

DB
